about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes

  • Empire rank 16 gunship “Thor”
  • Special weapon “Thunderbolt launcher”
  • Hull modifier “Emitter overload”

Additionally, the pilot receives:
  • Special ship pattern “Stretched waves”
  • Decor “Golden pearl”
  • Portrait “Lieutenant Getz Bayer”

Additionally, the pilot receives the modules:
  • Aiming overcharge
  • Combat reboot
  • Energy converter
  • Hull restoration system
  • Inertial stabilizer
  • Emergency barrier
  • Crystal Plates
  • Reinforced beams
  • Thermal insulator
  • Target tracking coprocessor
  • “Horizon” module
  • A set of Crystal drones - 50 pcs.

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 90 days!

The exact origin of Thor is unknown. According to rumours, the fighter was developed by the scientists of Martian laboratories before the First Invasion and was later transferred to the Inquisition. The ship’s existence was kept secret for a long time until the blueprints of Thor were received by the New Empire in 4621.

Soon the imperial pilots tested the ship in combat. AK-107 Thor squadrons carried out swift strikes against pirate bases, destroying superior marauding forces. The excellent combination of weapons, active modules and the ISES-13T onboard system makes this fighter a dangerous opponent in any battle.

Currently, with the permission of the Inquisition, the New Empire is preparing Thor for mass production. The UMC mercenaries will be able to get a weakened version of the gunship under a special contract.
detailed_description:
Attention! Identical packages can not be activated on the same account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This pack includes

  • Empire rank 16 gunship “Thor”
  • Special weapon “Thunderbolt launcher”
  • Hull modifier “Emitter overload”

Additionally, the pilot receives:
  • Special ship pattern “Stretched waves”
  • Decor “Golden pearl”
  • Portrait “Lieutenant Getz Bayer”

Additionally, the pilot receives the modules:
  • Aiming overcharge
  • Combat reboot
  • Energy converter
  • Hull restoration system
  • Inertial stabilizer
  • Emergency barrier
  • Crystal Plates
  • Reinforced beams
  • Thermal insulator
  • Target tracking coprocessor
  • “Horizon” module
  • A set of Crystal drones - 50 pcs.

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 90 days!

The exact origin of Thor is unknown. According to rumours, the fighter was developed by the scientists of Martian laboratories before the First Invasion and was later transferred to the Inquisition. The ship’s existence was kept secret for a long time until the blueprints of Thor were received by the New Empire in 4621.

Soon the imperial pilots tested the ship in combat. AK-107 Thor squadrons carried out swift strikes against pirate bases, destroying superior marauding forces. The excellent combination of weapons, active modules and the ISES-13T onboard system makes this fighter a dangerous opponent in any battle.

Currently, with the permission of the Inquisition, the New Empire is preparing Thor for mass production. The UMC mercenaries will be able to get a weakened version of the gunship under a special contract.

name: Star Conflict - Thor (Deluxe Edition)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
